ResourceHeader.ResourceName: CSSWE REPTile Level 1 6-s Counts and Position

RevisionEvent.Note: Only known prior ReleaseDate of the metadata
Added DOI and PublicationInfo minted by LFB, metadata versioned up to SPASE 2.6.0, reviewed by LFB 20230727

ResourceHeader.Description: This data set contains Level 1 corrected count rates from the Relativistic Electron and Proton Telescope integrated little experiment (REPTile)on board the Colorado Student Space Weather Experiment (CSSWE) CubeSat. Electron counts are provided for 0.5-1.7 MeV, 1.7-3.3 MeV, and >3.3 MeV. Proton counts are provided for 9-18 MeV, 19-30 MeV, and 30-40 MeV. All counts, in units of number per 6 seconds, have been corrected for transmission and temperature noise. L is calculated using the IGRF magnetic field model. Geographic latitude, longitude and altitude (km) are provided.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: Please acknowledge the PI and NASA SPDF for the CSSWE REPTile data.
